name: Dataresolve Technologies
tag_list: dlp, loss, protection, breach, antivirus, technology, usb, data, data-loss-prevention, data-protection, end-point-security
overview:
Dataresolve Technologies builds software products to help home users and businesses secure their critical information from being unauthorized copied or shared , theft and loss by allowing them to control any PC or Laptop from accessing any kind of removable media device, internet application or website.

Our products secures and protects business data and personal information in more than a dozen countries. Here are some of the reasons, why you should use our products for endpoint protection from USBs, CD-DVD, Applications and websites:-

  • Our Strong device control module allows you to control, block and monitor any kind of USB device used on your PC

  • Set access control on CD-DVD drives used on your system.

  • Set access control on the applications which can connect to internet and which can not. This helps you block users from accessing applications like voice over IP(VoIP), Chat Client (or Internet Messaging Client), File Sharing Programs, Peer to Peer Applications (P2P) and a lot more

  • Control what your browser can access. This helps you build a whitelist/ blacklist to control the kind of website which can be accessed on a PC

  • Get instant email alerts on any malicious activity on your PC â€“ unauthorized access by a USB or CD-DVD or access to a blacklisted website

  • Block users from uninstalling the product by setting an installation password Specialties
